message: Operation 'groundhogs' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description needs enhancement to explain the 2 available parameters (filtering/pagination), clarify the response structure, and reference the Groundhog schema for better AI agent understanding of available data.

data.current_description: Returns all prognosticating animals with their known predictions.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all prognosticating animals (groundhogs) in the database along with their associated annual predictions. Supports filtering and pagination via query parameters. Returns an array of Groundhog objects, each containing up to 18 properties including prediction history.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description needs enhancement to explain the 2 available parameters (filtering/pagination), clarify the response structure, and reference the Groundhog schema for better AI agent understanding of available data.

message: Operation 'groundhog' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the slug parameter's role and format, and doesn't explain the response structure. Enhanced version clarifies the path parameter and response schema for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Returns a prognosticating animal and its known predictions.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific prognosticating animal by its unique slug identifier along with all associated annual predictions. The slug parameter uniquely identifies a groundhog in the system. Returns a Groundhog object containing up to 18 properties including prediction history and metadata.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the slug parameter's role and format, and doesn't explain the response structure. Enhanced version clarifies the path parameter and response schema for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'predictions' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate but description is too brief. Enhanced version clarifies the required year parameter, explains what predictions contain (early spring vs. longer winter), and describes the response structure for better AI agent understanding of inputs and outputs.

data.current_summary: Get predictions for a given year
data.current_description: Get all predictions for a given year.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all annual weather predictions made by prognosticating animals for a specified year. Requires a year parameter to filter predictions. Returns an array of Prediction objects, each containing the prediction type (early spring or longer winter), the predicting animal, and associated metadata.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description is too brief. Enhanced version clarifies the required year parameter, explains what predictions contain (early spring vs. longer winter), and describes the response structure for better AI agent understanding of inputs and outputs.
